item.title: How is Data Governance (DG) different in Digital World
item.description: The need of Data Governance has been established at it has become one of the key initiative’s organizations are focusing on when it comes to managing the data.

item.title: Redesigning Enterprise Analytics Teams
item.description: Cloud technologies are changing the way we operate and do business. They enable us to focus the time and energy of the resources in developing applications rather than spending time on the maintaining the infrastructure.

item.title: Analytics Maturity (Part 1) - Introducing the Chasm
item.description: “The world’s most valuable resource is no longer oil, but data” — The Economist The above statement and article by The Economist sums up very nicely what we are reading, seeing, and witnessing everyday.
